dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset that consists of clean speech with added noise at various signal-to-noise ratios (SNRs). The dataset is used to train and evaluate models for unintrusively estimating PESQ using only the degraded (i.e., noisy) signal.
dcterms:title: DNS2020 dataset
